CHAT.comment: ROBERT MORRISON, ET AL., Petitioners v. NATIONAL AUSTRALIA BANK LTD., ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:07 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF THOMAS A. DUBBS ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF GEORGE T. CONWAY, III, ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MATTHEW D. ROBERTS, ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIE, SUPPORTING THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF THOMAS A. DUBBS ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 12:06 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
